title: Plotting Empirical Cumulative Distributions with Matplotlib
description: This tutorial demonstrates how to plot the empirical cumulative distribution function (ECDF) of a sample and the theoretical CDF using Matplotlib. ECDFs are also known as 'non-exceedance' curves in engineering, where the y-value for a given x-value gives the probability that an observation from the sample is below that x-value. Conversely, the empirical _complementary_ cumulative distribution function (the ECCDF, or 'exceedance' curve) shows the probability y that an observation from the sample is above a value x.

meta.title: Plotting ECDF and Theoretical CDF with Matplotlib | Data Visualization
meta.description: Learn how to plot the empirical cumulative distribution function (ECDF) of a sample and the theoretical CDF using Matplotlib in this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: ECDF, CDF, Matplotlib, Data Visualization, Python, Jupyter Notebook

i18n.title: 使用Matplotlib绘制经验累积分布
i18n.description: 本教程展示了如何使用Matplotlib绘制样本的经验累积分布函数（ECDF）和理论累积分布函数。在工程领域，ECDF也被称为“不超过”曲线，其中给定x值的y值表示样本观测值低于该x值的概率。相反，经验互补累积分布函数（ECCDF，或“超过”曲线）显示了样本观测值高于值x的概率y。

meta.title: 使用Matplotlib绘制ECDF和理论CDF | 数据可视化
meta.description: 在本综合教程中学习如何使用Matplotlib绘制样本的经验累积分布函数（ECDF）和理论累积分布函数。
meta.keywords: ECDF, CDF, Matplotlib, 数据可视化, Python, Jupyter Notebook
